content:
The following search parameters are missing expressions (both FHIRPath and XPath) in both the 2018Sep release and the latest build. They had existed in the 2018May release, except for MessageDefinition-parent, which I think is new. Should I open a single tracker item, or individual ones for each Resource for these changes?

Device-model : Device.model
Device-udi-carrier : Device.udi.carrierHRF | Device.udi.carrierAIDC
GuidanceResponse-request : GuidanceResponse.requestId
MessageDefinition-parent : MessageDefinition.parent
You can do a single change request per resource (so one for the two Device issues and one each for the other two)
